RE South Carolina Electric Gas Company Power Netting Agmt requestElizabeth SCEGs contact for you is Kenny Jackson I talk to my contact John Hancock If I need to get you an address or any other information please let me know Please update me on any changes in status Laura x Original Message From Sacks Edward Sent Monday November PM To Sager Elizabeth Cc Podurgiel Laura Subject South Carolina Electric Gas Company Power Netting Agmt request Elizabeth Can you please have one of your attys forward a draft of the power netting agmt to South Carolina EG It is my understanding that trading will be curtailed if not already shut down until this agmt is in place Luara will provide your atty a contact to forward the document to Thanks Ed
